title: DUO Terms
description: Data Use Ontology (DUO) terms from GA4GH for data use restrictions

terms.label: General Research Use
terms.description: For health/medical/biomedical research and other research purposes

terms.label: Disease-Specific Research
terms.description: For research related to a specific disease

terms.label: Population Origins or Ancestry Research Only
terms.description: For research related to population origins or ancestry

terms.label: Publication Required
terms.description: Publication of research results is required

terms.label: Collaboration Required
terms.description: Collaboration with data provider is required

terms.label: Ethics Approval Required
terms.description: Ethics approval is required for use

terms.label: Geographical Restriction
terms.description: Use is restricted to specific geographical regions
